TopicTitle: The Number War: Count to 100 or -100

Articles.Content: I can't type this damn fast on mobile! Bailing out!

WE WIN!

POSITIVES WIN ONCE AGAIN

Edited May 14, 2015 by windows_x_seven

Positives Won Finally!

The record setting game was finally won by the positives! This game broke the record of longest game, most reverts, and largest revert in page numbers,

Indeed, that was quite intense.

Good fight, everyone. Outstanding work.

Indeed, my hat is off to you negatives, you put up quite the fight!

Also, Deu and Fel, no hard feelings right?
Join the dark side, we have... well, used to have cookies. Someone ate them all, and left us a very rude note...

Now, here, have a text (I WANT THIS ON THE OP, PLEASE)

After an immense number of pages of positive vs negative fighting, we finally win. The positives are victorious once again.

We were attacked, but we managed to keep the negatives back, and didn't get pinned down. Always advancing into enemy territory.

Some perished on the way, some negatives joined our side, while other negatives kept on fighting. They, however, were no threat to us.

After all, we're the positives. There's no stopping us. We're like a breath exhaled from the Earth. Only one goal in sight:

We. Will. Win.
